mobileResponsivenessTip: Improve mobile layout for better readability and touch responsiveness, especially for navigation elements.
loadingSpeedTip: Optimize image sizes and minimize heavy scripts to enhance page load speed.
seoOptimizationTip: Improve on-page SEO by adding meta tags, alt texts for images, and optimizing headings.
userExperienceTip: Enhance user interface by simplifying navigation and ensuring consistent design elements across the site.
bookingFlowTip: Streamline the booking process by reducing unnecessary steps and improving the mobile booking interface.
tips: Improve page load times for better user retention.
Add more engaging content like reviews or local area information.
Ensure consistent branding and visual appeal across the site.
